description: A review concludes "many aspects" were "satisfactory", but says performance was a "mixed picture".
title: Guernsey's education committee faces 'many challenges', report says
title_page: Guernsey's education committee faces 'many challenges', report says - BBC News
maintext: "The overall conclusion seems to be that in many aspects governance is satisfactory with many remaining challenges and that effectiveness has improved over time and we feel this is a fair and balanced assessment," he added.
